sent.orig: When polymer concentration in higher than the critical aggregation concentration, the intermolecular hydrophobic ass.
sent.trans: 实验结果表明，稀溶液中疏水缔合聚合物分子的缔合以分子内缔合为主；在临界缔合浓度以上，缔合以分子间缔合为主。

sent.orig: Each surfactant manifests a characteristic concentration—critical micelle concentration (CMC)—at which micelles of characteristic size will form.
sent.trans: 每一种表面活性剂有一个特有的浓度——临界胶团浓度(CMC)——形成特定尺寸胶团的浓度。

sent.orig: Focusing takes concentration and concentration takes energy.
sent.trans: 重点需浓度，浓度需能源。

sent.orig: Low humic acid concentration accelerated 2,4-DCP photodegradation rate while high humic acid concentration restrained photodegradation.
sent.trans: 腐殖酸在低浓度时，促进光降解反应的进行，在高浓度时，2,4-DCP的光降解氧化受到抑制。

sent.orig: The folate concentration increased significantly while the homocysteine concentration decreased significantly.
sent.trans: 另含富马酸亚铁及葡萄糖酸亚铁，容易被人体吸收。
